attributes.action: Instead of asking, rather half heartedly, for people to switch of appliances and replace light bulbs at home, encourage via tax incentives electronic manufacturers to create items with no standby facility in place and hardware stores to only sell energy efficient lighting
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is vital that we do not put the pressure on the final consumer but much higher up the chain of command.  If we offer the companies, and in turn the shareholders tax incentives for green business and not half measures we will see changes in people’s lifestyles at home.  There needs to a change at the top.
